Html:
Hi the creator of GMap.NET,

 

I am very glad to see your work here. It's amazing for me.

 

But I really don't know how to start programming with it.

 

So could you share same simples to us?

 

thanks a lot.

 

Winston
all samples/demos are in the same solution

Hi radioman,

 

Thanks to your reply.

 

And I want to know whether can I use your dll file in ASP.NET?

 

what I need to do is print the Google Map which has sever destinations on it with route planning.

 

And the dead line is coming soon. so I am looking forward to your reply.

 

best regards

Winston

you can generate static image using this this library and display it in the web page, check BigMapMaker demo or look at StaticImage.cs in Demo.WindowsForms. Anyhow you can try web control http://googlemap.codeplex.com/

Another problem is,

when I was trying to run the whole project from this GMap.NET vs10.sln

it reported

Error    5    Cannot import the following key file: sn.snk. The key file may be password protected. To correct this, try to import the certificate again or import the certificate manually into the current user’s personal certificate store.    GMap.NET - Hot Build

 

so...... what should I do ?

By disabling the GMap.Net from source code I got the solution.Its working fine dear.

 

Thax a lot for this gr8 comment.

O(∩_∩)O,

I have met the same problem.

By unloading the GMap.NET - Hot Build project from source code , the whole project working fine.

3Q radioman
